meanings.sent1: She was undressing before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: He undresses quickly after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The magician undressed in front of the audience, revealing a different outfit underneath.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the sky undressed from its vibrant colors to a deep blue.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar undressed from its cocoon, emerging as a beautiful butterfly.

meanings.definition: The act of taking off clothing.
meanings.sent1: Her undressing was done in a hurry.
meanings.sent2: The undressing process can be awkward in public places.
meanings.sent3: The undressing of the mannequin revealed the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent4: The undressing of the tree in autumn is a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The undressing of the old building exposed its historical architecture.
